1.name: Default
1.description: First ship of the special Type-II Fubuki-class destroyers, Ayanami

2.name: Retrofit
2.description: Ayanami, retrofit complete. I feel stronger, yes... Having that said, Commander, can you pat my head? I want to be spoiled a bit...

3.name: Demon's Finest Dress
3.description: This dress is... Ayanami's. I'm not used to this dress yet... Commander, do you think it fits me?

4.name: Witch in Ambush
4.description: I heard that... I need to wear a costume like this to participate in Halloween festivities. Commander... do I look cute?

5.name: Niconico
5.description: I've found a new video… Commander, how about we watch a live stream together later?

6.name: Rock'n KIJIN
6.description: Commander, shall we listen to some music together? Do you like… this non-weaponized version of me?

7.name: Lunar Demon
7.description: Compared to the way we celebrate New Year in the Sakura Empire, the festivities of the Dragon Empery have a completely different atmosphere... But, I don't really mind the liveliness... Commander, do you like festivals?

limitBreak.tier2: Max Torpedo Capacity +1, Pre-Loaded Torpedo +1, Torpedo Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Full Barrage II, All Weapon Efficiency +5%

1.name: Demon God
1.description: 5% chance of activation upon firing. For 12 seconds, increases own torpedo stats by 30% (60%)

2.name: Demon Dance
2.description: Every 20 seconds, has a 40% (70%) chance to active Demon Mode, increasing own Evasion by 30% for 5 seconds and releasing a powerful barrage while launching fast torpedoes in a helical pattern

3.name: Full Barrage I-II
3.description: Every 15 (10) times the main battery is fired, trigger Full Barrage - Ayanami I (II)

1.chinese: 特II型綾波级驱逐舰一番舰—綾波
1.chineseTL: First ship of the special Type-II Ayanami-class destroyer - Ayanami
1.japanese: 特Ⅱ型駆逐艦一番艦・綾波
1.japaneseTL: Special Type II Destroyer Number One - Ayanami
1.english: First ship of special Type II Ayanami class destroyers, Ayanami.

2.chinese: 吹雪级驱逐舰的改良舰綾波……的说，对我来说，战斗没什么好害怕的，所以虽然只是驱逐舰，但是无论什么敌人我都敢一战……
2.chineseTL: I am...the improved model of the Fubuki-class destroyers, Ayanami. I'm not afraid of battling, so although I'm just a destroyer, I dare to challenge any enemy I face...
2.japanese: 吹雪型駆逐艦の改良型、綾波……です。戦闘は怖くないです。駆逐艦だけど、どんな敵とも戦える、です……
2.japaneseTL: I'm Ayanami… an improved model of the Fubuki-class destroyer. I'm not afraid of combat. Although I'm just a destroyer, no matter what the enemy is, I can fight them…
2.english: I am Ayanami, an improved Fubuki-class destroyer. I am not afraid of combat. Though just a destroyer, I can fight any enemy...

3.chinese: 綾波……的说，他们喜欢叫我“鬼神”就是了。请多指教
3.chineseTL: I'm...Ayanami, they like calling me the "Demon". Thanks for having me.
3.japanese: 綾波……です。「鬼神」とよく言われるのです。よろしくです
3.japaneseTL: I'm… Ayanami. I'm often called a demon. Pleasure to meet you.
3.english: I'm... Ayanami. I am often called the "Demon." Pleasure to meet you.

4.chinese: 指挥官，吃了吗？我这里还有点心
4.chineseTL: Commander, have you eaten already? I have some dim sum here.
4.japanese: 指揮官は食べました？おやつ、です
4.japaneseTL: Commander, have you eaten yet? Here, a snack.
4.english: Commander, have you eaten yet? Here's some snacks.

5.chinese: 这次有好好的检查了通讯设备，不会再给您添麻烦了……
5.chineseTL: I have properly maintained the communication equipment this time. It won't be causing you annoyance anymore...
5.japanese: 通信設備、今度はちゃんと整備したのです。迷惑をかけないのです……
5.japaneseTL: I'm maintaining my communication equipment properly this time. It won't be causing anyone trouble…
5.english: I've inspected the communication equipment. It won't cause any more problems...

6.chinese: 綾波的耳朵……比较可爱吗？不太懂……指挥官开心就好
6.chineseTL: Ayanami's ears...are pretty cute right? I don't really understand...but it's fine if the Commander is happy.
6.japanese: 綾波のミミ……可愛いですか？…わからないです。指揮官が楽しんでいればいいです
6.japaneseTL: My ears are… cute? …I don't get it. As long as you like them, I don't mind.
6.english: Ayanami's ears... are they cute? I don't understand... As long as you're happy, Commander!

7.chinese: 最近时常会做和大家走散的噩梦，一定是我做的还不够好……
7.chineseTL: Recently I've been having nightmares about being separated from everyone, it must be because I've not been working hard enough...
7.japanese: 最近みんなとはぐれる夢をよく見るのです。きっとまだ十分上手く頑張っていないからです……
7.japaneseTL: Lately I've been having dreams where I lose sight of everyone else. It's got to be because I've not been working hard enough…
7.english: I've been having nightmares of all the girls getting lost... I'm certain that it's my fault, too...

8.chinese: 指挥官？…不，没事。我只是确认一下你是不是还在
8.chineseTL: Commander?..no,nothing. I am just confirming if you are still here.
8.japanese: 指揮官？…いいえ、大丈夫です。まだいるか確認するだけです
8.japaneseTL: Commander? …No, everything is fine. I was just checking to see if you were still here.
8.english: Commander? No, nothing. I just wanted to see if you were here or not.

9.japanese: うぅーーちょっとくすぐったいです……
9.japaneseTL: Uuuh… I'm a little ticklish there…

10.chinese: 指挥官，请不要……乱碰，感觉……有点奇怪
10.chineseTL: Commander, please don't touch...randomly, It feels...a bit strange.
10.japanese: 指揮官、あまり触らないで……です。変な感じです…
10.japaneseTL: Commander, don't… touch me there so much. It feels weird…
10.english: Commander... please... don't touch there so much... It's making me feel weird...

11.chinese: 虽然不太明白这样有什么意义……但是有点高兴（蹭蹭）
11.chineseTL: Although I'm not sure what is meaning of this...but I feel a bit happy. *rubs*
11.japanese: よくわからないですけど……ちょっと嬉しい、です
11.japaneseTL: I don't really know why, but… that made me happy.
11.english: I don't really get it but... I'm a bit happy...

12.chinese: 指挥官的新任务下达了
12.japanese: 指揮官、新しい任務が通達されたのです
12.japaneseTL: Commander, we've been notified of a new mission.
12.english: Commander, we've been notified of new missions.

13.chinese: 之前完成的任务，奖励送来了……
13.chineseTL: The reward for the previous mission has arrived...
13.japanese: この前の任務、報酬が来たのです……
13.japaneseTL: The rewards for the previous mission have arrived…
13.english: The rewards for the previous mission are here.

15.chinese: 指挥官在战场上和我有点像，稍微……有点帅
15.chineseTL: Commander on the battlefield looked a bit like me, and...looked a bit cool.
15.japanese: 戦場での指揮官はちょっと綾波と似てるです。ちょっと……かっこいいです
15.japaneseTL: You're a little like me on the battlefield, Commander. That's pretty… cool.
15.english: Commander, you're a little like me on the battlefield... That's... pretty cool.

16.japanese: ……指揮官、委託が完了したのです

17.japanese: 力が溢れてきたのです……

18.japaneseTL: Do you want to… go to Solomon?

19.chinese: 第一名吗？虽然并不是很懂那是什么意思，不过，谢谢
19.chineseTL: MVP? Even if I don't really understand, regardless, thank you.
19.japanese: 一位、ですか？よくわからないですけど、でも、ありがとです
19.japaneseTL: First place? I'm not sure what that means, but, thank you.
19.english: MVP? I don't really get it, but... thanks.

20.chinese: 没关系……我自己很快就会好起来的
20.japanese: 大丈夫です……自分でよくなるです…
20.japaneseTL: It's all right… I'll improve myself…

21.chineseTL: The power of the "Demon", come feel it!
21.japaneseTL: Taste the power of the demon…!
21.english: Bear witness to the true power of the "Demon"

22.japaneseTL: I don't want to be… alone…
22.english: I don't want... to be alone...

23.chineseTL: ...I don't really want to get close to Commander...
23.japanese: ……指揮官にはあまり近づきたくないのです…
23.japaneseTL: …I don't really want to come close to you, Commander.
23.english: I don't really want to get any closer.

24.chinese: 对指挥官的看法？綾波不是很明白……
24.chineseTL: My thoughts on the Commander? Ayanami doesn't really understand...
24.japanese: 指揮官のイメージですか？綾波わからないのです……
24.japaneseTL: My impression of you? I don't know…
24.english: Ayanami's impressions of Commander? I don't really know.

25.chinese: 指挥官……你一直说綾波的耳朵可爱，但是为什么不摸摸看呢？
25.chineseTL: Commander...you keep saying that my ears are cute, but why haven't you tried touching them yet?
25.japanese: 指揮官……綾波のミミがかわいいとずっと言っているようですが、なぜ触らないのです？
25.japaneseTL: Commander… you keep saying that my ears are cute, but why haven't you tried touching them yet?
25.english: Commander, you're always saying that my ears are cute... But why won't you touch them?

26.chinese: 如果说有什么担心的事情……大概就是不在指挥官身边吧……
26.chineseTL: If there's one thing that bothers me...it's probably whenever I'm not beside that Commander...
26.japanese: 心配することと言えば……指揮官がそばにいないこと、ですね……
26.japaneseTL: If there's anything I worry about… it would be you not being by my side, Commander…
26.english: If there's one thing that worries me... it would be when you are not at my side.

27.chinese: 我不讨厌战斗，也不喜欢，只是普通地战斗而已……现在的话，为了指挥官……感觉，会变得更强
27.chineseTL: I don't hate nor like combat, I just fight as normal...and now, for the Commander...I feel like, I would become stronger.
27.japanese: 戦闘は嫌いではないけど好きじゃないです。ただ普通に戦ってただけ……だけど、今は指揮官のためなら……もう少し、強くなれる気がするのです
27.japaneseTL: I don't hate combat, but I don't like it either. I just fight, like always… but now, if I'm fighting for you, Commander… then I feel like I can become a little stronger.
27.english: I don't particularly... like or dislike combat. I just do what must be done. But if it's for you, Commander... maybe I can get a bit stronger.

28.chinese: 放心吧，这次我无论如何都会活下来，然后回到指挥官面前……因为……我想见指挥官……
28.chineseTL: Relax, this time no matter what happens I will survive, then return to the Commander...because...I want to see the Commander again...
28.japanese: 安心して、今度こそどんなことがあっても生き延びて指揮官のもとに帰るのです……だって……指揮官にはまた会いたいんですもの……
28.japaneseTL: Rest assured that this time, no matter what happens, I'll live through it and return to you, Commander… because I'll always want to see you again…
28.english: Rest assured... This time, no matter what happens, I'll survive and return to you... because I'll always want to see you again...

29.japanese: 綾波、みんなを守るのです

30.chinese: 拉菲…房间里的氧气可乐又不够了…
30.chineseTL: Laffey... we ran out of Oxycola...
30.japanese: ラフィー、酸素コーラ...また足りなくのです
30.japaneseTL: Laffey... we ran out of Oxycola again...

31.chineseTL: Long Island... don't be distracted in the battlefield
31.japanese: ロングアイランド、戦場ではよそ見しないのです
31.japaneseTL: Long Island, don't be distracted in the battlefield

32.chineseTL: I'll leave aviation support to you
32.japanese: 航空支援、任せるのです
32.japaneseTL: I'll trust aviation support on you

33.chinese: 不知道写什么好…总之，这里有指挥官、有大家，很开心。以后也想和大家在一起。这是绫波做的巧克力，请收下。
33.chineseTL: I didn't know what to write... Anyways, there is Commander, everyone here, I'm happy. I wish we can all stay together in the future. Here is Ayanami's chocolate, please receive it.
33.japanese: なんと言えばいいですか…とにかく、ここには指揮官がいて、みんながいて、楽しいです。これからもみんなと一緒にいたいです。うん…綾波のチョコです。よろしくです。
33.japaneseTL: I don't know what I should say… Anyway, you're here, Commander, and everyone else is too, so I'm happy. I hope we can all stay here together. Yeah… here is my chocolate. You have my thanks.
33.english: How should I say this... Um, anyway, having Commander here, as well as all my friends here, is very fun. I would like to stay with everyone, together. Um... here is Ayanami's handmade chocolate, please enjoy it.

34.chinese: 指挥官，情人节的巧克力，希望你能收下。里面有绫波的心意，应该会好吃……请多指教
34.chineseTL: Commander, Valentine's chocolate, please take it. I poured my feelings in it, it should taste good... I will be in your care
34.japanese: 指揮官、バレンタインのチョコ、受け取って欲しいです。綾波のキモチを込めたですから、美味しく作れたはず…です。よろしくです
34.japaneseTL: Commander, I hope you take this Valentine's chocolate. I poured my feelings into it, it should taste good... please take good care of me.

1.chinese: 綾波，改造完毕…的说。感觉变得更强了，不过…指挥官，能摸摸我的头吗？稍微有点…想要撒娇…
1.chineseTL: Ayanami, retrofit complete... yes. It feels that I got stronger, but... Commander, can you pet my head? It slightly feels.. like I want to be pampered more.
1.japanese: 綾波、改造完了……です。強くなったのです、けど…指揮官、綾波をナデナデしてもらっていい…ですか？少しだけ、甘えたい気分……です
1.japaneseTL: My retrofitting has been… completed. But… Commander, could you pat my head… please? I feel like being indulged… just a little.
1.english: Ayanami, retrofit complete. I feel stronger, yes... Having that said, Commander, can you pat my head? I want to be pampered a bit...

2.chinese: 和指挥官在一起，感觉就能有更多干劲——
2.chineseTL: Together with Commander, I feel a lot more motivated--
2.japanese: 指揮官と一緒なら、やる気ももっと出る、です
2.japaneseTL: When I'm with you I feel more… motivated, Commander.
2.english: Commander, I feel like I can work a bit harder when I'm with you...

3.chinese: 和大家在一起很开心，所以我…想和大家在一起
3.chineseTL: I'm happy together with everyone, so I... wish to be with everyone.
3.japanese: みんなと一緒にいるのは楽しいですから、綾波も…みんなともっと一緒にいたいです
3.japaneseTL: It's fun to be with everyone, so I want to stay together with everyone.
3.english: Being with everyone makes me happy... so I want to be able to stay together...

4.chinese: 指挥官不理我的话，会有点…伤心
4.chineseTL: If Commander ignores me, I will be a bit... sad.
4.japanese: 指揮官が綾波をかまってくれないと、少しだけ悲しい…です
4.japaneseTL: Commander, when you won't pay attention to me, it makes me just a little… sad.
4.english: Commander, if you leave me alone... I'll be hurt...

5.japanese: 指揮官の手、温かいです…

6.chinese: 没关系的，指挥官…相信我——
6.chineseTL: It is alright, Commander... believe in me--
6.japanese: 大丈夫です、指揮官…綾波を信じて――
6.japaneseTL: It's all right, Commander… Believe in me.
6.english: It will be all right, Commander... Believe in me...

7.chinese: 如果是为了大家，我愿意化身为“鬼神”…
7.chineseTL: If it is for everyone, I am willing to transform to a "Demon".
7.japanese: みんなのためなら、「鬼神」になってもいい…です
7.japaneseTL: I'm fine with becoming a demon… if it's for everyone else's sake.
7.english: If it is for everyone's sake... I am willing to become the "Demon."

1.chinese: 还是绫波...的说。这样的服装，还不太习惯...指挥官，觉得合适吗？
1.chineseTL: This is Ayanami... yes. This outfit, I am not quite used to it... Commander, do you think it's appropriate?
1.japanese: 綾波……です。この衣装、まだ慣れないですけど…指揮官、綾波に似合っているのですか？
1.japaneseTL: This is... Ayanami. This outfit, I am not quite used to it but... Commander, does it suit me?

2.chinese: 无论去那里，我都会跟上你的脚步的...一起出发吧，指挥官
2.chineseTL: Regardless of where it is, I will follow your footsteps... let us go together, Commander.
2.japanese: どこに行っても、綾波はついていくのです。…指揮官、一緒に出発です
2.japaneseTL: No matter where you go, Ayanami will follow you... Commander, let's head out together.

3.chinese: 现在的话，能感觉到自己不是孤单一人...因为指挥官一直在这里
3.chineseTL: If it's now, I can feel that I am not alone... as Commander is always here.
3.japanese: 今は、綾波がひとりじゃないってわかるのです。…だって指揮官がここにいるんですもの
3.japaneseTL: Now, Ayanami isn't alone... Commander is always here.

4.chinese: 不太明白这身衣服的含义...不过，如果指挥官喜欢，我会一直穿着的
4.chineseTL: I don't quite understand the meaning of these clothes... but, if Commander likes it, I will keep wearing it.
4.japanese: この服の意味、よくわからないです。…でも指揮官が好きなら、ずっと着ていてもいいと思うです
4.japaneseTL: I don't quite understand the meaning of these clothes... but, if Commander likes it, I will keep wearing them.

5.chinese: 大家都太过热情...一直在盯着我看。突然这样还不太习惯...
5.chineseTL: Everyone is so excited... keep on staring at me. Doing it this sudden... I'm not used to it.
5.japanese: みんな、盛り上がっていたです。…綾波はじっと見られていたのですけど…まだ、ちょっと慣れない、です
5.japaneseTL: Everyone is so excited... they keep staring at me... I'm not quite used to it.

6.chinese: 指挥官？…不，没事。我只是确认一下你是不是还在
6.chineseTL: Commander?... It's nothing. I was checking if you were still here.

7.chinese: 这样和指挥官靠在一起的感觉很好，我很喜欢
7.chineseTL: To be together side by side with Commander is nice, I like it very much.
7.japanese: 指揮官と寄り添い合っている感触、気持ちよくて好きです
7.japaneseTL: To feel so close to Commander, I like it very much.

8.chinese: 还是感觉…有点奇怪，不过…你喜欢就好
8.chineseTL: It still feels... a little weird, but.. as long as you like it.
8.japanese: やっぱり、ちょっとだけ…変な感じ、です……ううん、指揮官が好きなら綾波、ダイジョウブです
8.japaneseTL: As I thought, it still feels a bit... weird... but, if Commander likes it, it's fine.

9.chinese: 指挥官…需要揉一下肩膀？
9.chineseTL: Commander, do you need to massage your shoulders a little?
9.japanese: 指揮官…肩もみもみでもどうですか？
9.japaneseTL: Commander... how about a shoulder massage?

10.chinese: 有指挥官在，就绝对不会输
10.chineseTL: There's Commander here, I definitely won't lose.
10.japanese: 指揮官さえいれば、絶対に負けないです
10.japaneseTL: As Commander is here, I absolutely won't lose.

11.chinese: 有指挥官在，就绝对不会输
11.chineseTL: I'm very happy being together with everyone, but... I still do want, to be together with Commander.
11.japanese: みんなと一緒にいるのは嬉しいです。けど…綾波、指揮官と二人っきりでもっといたいです
11.japaneseTL: Being together with everyone makes me happy. But... Ayanami, I want to be just with Commander even more.

1.chinese: 听说参加万圣夜必须得穿上类似的衣服……指挥官……现在的我好看吗？
1.chineseTL: I heard that I should wear appropriate clothes for Halloween...Commander...do I look good?
1.japanese: ハロウィンに参加するにはこういう服を着なければならない、と聞いたのです。指揮官…今の綾波はカワイイですか？
1.japaneseTL: I heard that one must wear these kinds of clothes when participating in Halloween festivities. Commander… do I look cute like this?

2.chinese: 这是……糖果？谢谢，我会尝尝看的……
2.chineseTL: Is this...candy? Thank you, I shall try it...
2.japanese: これは……お菓子ですか？ありがとです。食べるです
2.japaneseTL: Are these… sweets? Thank you. I will eat them.

3.chinese: 除去战斗与训练，世界上好像还存在其他形式的乐趣……
3.chineseTL: Other than combat and training, there seems to be other forms of entertainment in this world...
3.japanese: 戦闘と訓練以外も、楽しいことはあるのです、ね……
3.japaneseTL: There are fun things outside of combat and training, too…

4.chinese: 如果站在南瓜灯上，会不会离天空更近些呢？
4.chineseTL: If I stand on the pumpkin lantern, would I be closer to the sky?
4.japanese: かぼちゃのライトの上に立っていれば、空により近づけるのですか？
4.japaneseTL: If I were to stand on this pumpkin lamp, will I come even closer to the sky?

5.chineseTL: These clothes, I like them a lot...

6.chinese: 今夜的我不是鬼神，而是魔女……
6.chineseTL: I am not a demon tonight, but a witch...
6.japanese: 「今夜の私（わたくし）はキシンではなく、マジョ……」（ひらひら）
6.japaneseTL: "Tonight I 'm not a demon, but a witch…" (Flicker)

1.japanese: 新着動画、発見です…指揮官、あとで生放送でも一緒にどうです？
1.japaneseTL: I've found a new video… Commander, how about we watch a live stream together later?

1.chinese: 指挥官，一起听歌吗？兵器以外的我…喜欢吗？
1.chineseTL: Commander, want to listen to music together? Do you like this Ayanami without weapons?
1.japanese: 指揮官、一緒に音楽を聞くのはどうですか？兵器ではない綾波…お気に入りですか？
1.japaneseTL: Commander, shall we listen to some music together? Do you like… this non-weaponized version of me?

2.chinese: 指挥官，工作之前，要先听一会儿音乐吗？
2.chineseTL: Commander, before we start work, shall we listen to some music?
2.japanese: 指揮官、仕事の前に、音楽でも一緒にどうですか？
2.japaneseTL: Commander, before we get to work, shall we listen to some music together?

3.chinese: 戴上耳机后，感觉全世界就只剩下音乐，还有……眼前的人
3.chineseTL: Wearing these headphones, it feels like there is only music left in this world and... the person in front of me.
3.japanese: ヘッドホンをつければ、流れる音…そして目の前にいる人だけが世界の全てです
3.japaneseTL: When I wear these headphones, the music that plays… and the person in front of my eyes are the only things in the world to me.

4.chinese: 指挥官，标枪约我等会儿一起去玩，我可以去吗？
4.chineseTL: Commander, Javelin called me over to play, may I go?
4.japanese: 指揮官、ジャベリンから誘われたのですけど、行っていいですか？
4.japaneseTL: Commander, Javelin called me over, but… Is it okay for me to go?

5.chinese: 指挥官喜欢什么样的歌呢？我的话……唔，摇滚？
5.chineseTL: What kind of music does Commander like? I like... Hm, Rock 'n' Roll?
5.japanese: 指揮官はどんな曲が好きですか？綾波は…ロックンロール？
5.japaneseTL: Commander, what kind of tunes do you like? I think I like… Rock 'n' Roll?

6.chinese: 雷说她最近在玩“手机游戏”……指挥官，“手机游戏”是什么？
6.chineseTL: Ikazuchi said she has been playing a "mobage" recently... Commander, what's a "mobage"?
6.japanese: 雷は「そしゃげ」にハマっていると言っていたのですけど……指揮官、「そしゃげ」は何ですか？
6.japaneseTL: Ikazuchi said she's hooked on a "casual game," but… Commander, what is a "casual game "?

7.chinese: 綾波的武器，现在还能变形成乐器…指挥官，想听听看吗？
7.chineseTL: Ayanami's weapon, can now transform into a musical instrument... Commander, want to listen?
7.japanese: 綾波の艤装、楽器になれるのです。…指揮官、綾波の演奏を聞きたいですか？
7.japaneseTL: My rigging can turn into a musical instrument. …Commander, do you want to hear me play?

8.chinese: 今天的奖励，稍微有些期待…
8.japanese: 今日の報酬、少し期待できるのです
8.japaneseTL: You can look forward to the reward today.

9.chinese: 训练与委托…无论何时都不能懈怠…
9.japanese: 訓練と委託…どんな時でも怠けてはいけないのです
9.japaneseTL: Training and commissions… One must never be idle.

10.chineseTL: This tune is perfect for battle...
10.japanese: 今聞いている曲、戦場にはピッタリです
10.japaneseTL: The tune I'm listening to right now is perfect for battle.

11.chinese: “只要微笑就可以了”…那是什么意思？
11.chineseTL: "A smile is all you need"... what does that mean?
11.japanese: 「笑えばいい」…どういう意味ですか？
11.japaneseTL: "It's okay to smile"… what does that mean?

1.chinese: 东煌的新年和重樱的新年，氛围完全不一样…的说。不过，这样热闹的气氛也不坏，指挥官也…喜欢节日吗?
1.chineseTL: The new year for the Eastern Radiance and the Sakura Empire, the atmosphere is totally different... yes. But, the lively atmosphere isn't bad, Commander.. do you like the holidays too?
1.japanese: 東煌のお正月と重桜のお正月、結構雰囲気が違う…です。みんなでワイワイやる雰囲気も悪くないです。指揮官もこういう祝日が好き…ですか？
1.japaneseTL: The new year for the Eastern Radiance and the Sakura Empire, the atmosphere is totally different... yes. Everyone is so lively, the atmosphere isn't bad. Does Commander also like these kinds of holidays too?
1.english: Compared to the way we celebrate New Year in the Sakura Empire, the festivities of the Dragon Empery have a completely different atmosphere... But, I don't really mind the liveliness... Commander, do you like festivals?

2.chinese: 指挥官，东煌那边好像在吃“年夜饭”?……要不要和绫波一起去看看?
2.chineseTL: Commander, the Eastern Radiance (girls) over there seems to be eating "reunion dinner"... do you want to have a look together with Ayanami?
2.japanese: 指揮官、東煌の仲間たちはネンヤー……大みそかのご飯を食べているです。綾波と一緒に見にに行くです？
2.japaneseTL: Commander, our Eastern Radiance friends are having... "reunion dinner" over there. Would want to go with Ayanami to take a look?
2.english: Commander, the girls from the Dragon Empery seem to be having a banquet... Want to come with me to have a look?

3.chinese: 东煌风格的衣服，轻巧，感觉不坏…很可爱?谢谢…的说。
3.chineseTL: The Eastern Radiance style clothes, it's light, it doesn't feel bad... it's cute? Thank you... yes.
3.japanese: 東煌風の衣装は軽くて、悪くない感じです。…かわいい、ですか？ありがと…です
3.japaneseTL: These Eastern Radiance clothes feel light, not a bad feeling... it's cute? Thanks...
3.english: This outfit feels light and easy to move in, not bad at all... Very cute? Um... thank you...

4.chinese: 东煌的春节好像要吃饺子…诶?不是煎饺而是水饺…的说?
4.chineseTL: The Eastern Radiance New year, seems like I have to eat dumplings... eh? It isn't grilled dumplings... but steamed?
4.japanese: 東煌のお正月、餃子を食べるらしいです。……焼餃子ではなく、水餃子…です？
4.japaneseTL: Seems like you eat dumpings during Eastern Radiance's New year... not grilled dumplings, steamed...?
4.english: This year's zodiac animal is... Eh? Commander, did you see where the piglet ran off to?

5.chinese: 指挥官，为什么港区里会有爆炸的声音?诶?那是庆祝节日用的道具吗?有点有趣…的说。
5.chineseTL: Commander, why are there sounds of explosions in the dock area? Eh? That are tools to celebrate the new year? Seems interesting... yes.
5.japanese: 指揮官、母港での爆発音はなんですか？祝日のアイテム…？面白そう…です
5.japaneseTL: Commander, what are those explosive sounds from the dock area? Festivity items...? Seems interesting...
5.english: Commander, are we under attack? I hear a lot of explosions... Eh? So those are a form of celebration? That sounds interesting, yes...

6.chinese: 铃铃~铃铃~铃铛的音色…很合适新年的氛围……
6.chineseTL: Ring ring~~ Ring ring~~ the sounds of the bell... it is suitable for the atmosphere of the New Year.
6.japanese: （チリンチリン）鈴の音、春節の雰囲気とピッタリ、です
6.japaneseTL: Ring ring~~ Ring ring~~ the sounds of the bell go well with the atmosphere during Spring Festival.
6.english: What is this "ding-a-ling" sound? It reminds me... of our New Year back home...

7.chinese: 指挥官，这衣服的材质摸起来很舒服…要试试……?
7.chineseTL: Commander, the materials of the clothes feels very comfortable... do you want to try...?
7.japanese: 指揮官、この衣装の素材、いい触り心地です。…触ってみたい…ですか？
7.japaneseTL: Commander, the materials used for these clothes, feel very comfortable... do you want to get a feel?
7.english: Commander, this dress is made with really comfortable materials... What to feel?

8.chinese: 指挥官，那里，不可以掀起来……的说。
8.chineseTL: Commander, there, you can't lift it.... yes.
8.japanese: 指揮官、そこは……めくってはダメ…です
8.english: Commander, you can't... lift that part...

9.chinese: 欢乐祥和的节日，绫波希望就这样和指挥官一起度过…的说
9.chineseTL: A holiday which is joyful and peaceful, Ayanami wishes to spend such a day with the Commander... yes.
9.japanese: 楽しい祝日は綾波、こうして指揮官と一緒に過ごしたい…です
9.japaneseTL: Joyful festivities are how Ayanami wants to spend time together with Commander...
9.english: I wish you a happy and peaceful holiday~ Commander, I hope that we can continue being together like this forever...
